Class BankAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • BankAccount

  • public abstract class BankAccount
extends java.lang.Object
    The BankAccount abstract class defines any type of bank account.
    Author:
    Juan Lopez

      BankAccount(int accountType, int aNum, double bal, double rt)
      standard constructor

      • BankAccount

        public BankAccount(int accountType,
           int aNum,
           double bal,
           double rt)
        standard constructor
        Parameters:
        accountType: - 1-saving, 2-checking
        aNum - account Number
        bal - account balance
        rt - interest rate

    • Method Detail

      • monthlyProcess

        public abstract void monthlyProcess()
        monthly process must be implemented by each subclass, depending on type bank account, each method will be different.

      • deposit

        public void deposit(double amount)
        adds money to the account
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount to add

      • withdraw

        public boolean withdraw(double amount)
        removes money from the account
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount to withdraw from the account
        Returns:
        true if there was sufficient funds to complete
